DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study conduct observational assessment natural outcome within Duke Smoking Cessation Program ( DSCP ) , `` Quit Duke . '' This assessment include information regard abstinence rate , change patient emotional state follow treatment , cost operation . Primarily , study assess financial sustainability cost-effectiveness program .
DOC.brief_title: Study Smoking Cessation Cost Outcomes Duke Smoking Cessation Program
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study conduct observational assessment natural outcome within DSCP , `` Quit Duke . '' This observational study ( n=3000 ) patient treat DSCP . No intervention conduct , data analyze collected course clinical care clinic visit Duke Smoking Cessation Program ( DSCP ) . Phone call also conduct determine response medication abstinence status 12 month follow quit attempt . Outcomes variables include : demographic variable , evaluation response , feasibility data , abstinence rate analyze use general regression model use ANOVA-based design . Because intervention conduct , safety concern relate study .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 old Being treat Duke Smoking Cessation Program Fluent write spoken English . N/A
